name: ENDO PHARMACEUTICALS INC.
sampleDescriptions:
Oversight of implementation of the America Invents Act.
Issues relating to patent settlements.
Patent reform.
Issues relating to misuse of the inter pares review process.

Issues relating to prescription drug abuse.
Issues relating to incentives for tamper-resistant formulations.
Issues relating to FDA approvals of new drugs and generic drugs.
Issues related to the FDA.

Issues relating to incentives for life sciences research.
Tax treatment of inverted companies.
Tax issues in mergers and acquisitions of US firms.
Issues relating to Mass Torts and Class Action Reform.
